content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal (position x)

### Iron plate crafting area
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z) that crafts iron gear wheels using iron plates and iron sticks
- Inserter (position a) that puts items into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
